alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 3:10AM CDT until May 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected, especially during times of high tide. * WHERE...Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide at Bob Hall Pier is 10:33 AM. High tide at Port Aransas is 10:23 AM. High tide at Port O`Connor is 4:19 PM.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
